New way detail: Tasty meals that warm your heart, eureka moments for cooking of inspiration,  a blink of emotional gourmet……they are all packed in the XinweiCook kit delivered to your door. Skip all the tedious steps, we refine for you the best enjoyable experience in cooking.
reason 1 detail: Our professional chefs from 5-star hotels design the recipes, source the fresh ingredients, Mis en place, prepare the stock and source, Sous-vide……let us do all the boring part in cooking.
reason 2 detail: Step by step, just follow the 6 steps designed by the professions to cook, or simply heat the ‘ready-to-eat’ food pack, you may have a delicious meal of heart at any time.
reason 3 detail: We search for the real masters in food supplying. Eco friendly, safe, sustainable…… We keep the exclusive standards of ingredients selection. Natural breeding, from farm to table…… we reduce intermediate links and assure the best quality of the food you receive.
reason 4 detail: We ensure everything arriving pre-portioned to minimize food waste and prep time. All ingredients are separately packed fresh with no risk of odor. 100% cold chain transportation makes delivery as fast as within 45 minutes upon ordering.
